name: Muckstalker

skills.name: Pounce
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 30% chance of placing a [Block Buffs] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Damage +10%
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Strangle
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Places a [Sleep] debuff for 2 turns if the target has no active buffs.
Damage based on: [ATK] [HP]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Herbal Balm
skills.raw_description: Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 2 turns if incoming damage exceeds 20% HP in one attack.
